title: Alister Jack – 2021 Statement Following Death of HRH The Duke of Edinburgh
author: admin
summary: The statement made by Alister Jack, the Secretary of State for Scotland, on 9 April 2021.
content:
It is with great sadness that we mark the passing of Prince Philip, the Duke of Edinburgh.
